abstract: MLB Roundup; Boston Red Sox rally to beat Washington Nationals, 8-7; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Boston got three unearned runs in the seventh inning, without a hit, and went on to defeat Washington.

headline.main: Nationals’ Errors Fuel Rally by Red Sox
headline.print_headline: Nationals’ Errors Fuel Late Rally by Red Sox

snippet: Boston got three unearned runs in the seventh inning, without a hit, and went on to defeat Washington.
